title: Finding Home
description: From Emilia Finn, a real-life full-contact fighter, comes Finding Home - A powerful tale of family, heroism, and propulsive suspense. Sometimes, the only way to save the girl is to teach her how to fight.Bobby Kincaid is a twenty-six year old MMA fighter whose life has always revolved around his family and gym. The oldest of three boys, the natural born leader, his loyalty and time are already spoken for. But the day the shy accountant with too much baggage and a teenage kid steps into his life, is the day everything changes. One dance, one kiss, and Bobby was sunk. Too bad Kit leaves with someone else.Bobby's not the kind of guy that'll back down after one jab. His lifelong dream was to become a world champion - He did that already. Now his dream depends on the safety and happiness of one particular blonde beauty.
author: Emilia Finn
